posts.post_content:
3.5/5 (being [Mana Drain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Drain) 5/5 [Counterspell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Counterspell) 4.5/5 and [Arcane Denial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcane Denial) 4/5)  
  
Lets say you counter a for UU1 (cancel, stoic rebutual, dismiss, hinder...) and for one colorless mana your opponent discard a card. This is card advantage. Little less tan Dismiss and Cryptic Command 4/ both.
